tool_description: Provide 400+ GRE verbal questions (Sentence Equivalence, Text Completion)
name: GRE Verbal
title: GRE Verbal

api_list.name: GRE Verbal Sentence Equivalence
api_list.description: Return a random list of Sentence Equivalence questions.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gre-verbal.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/questions?subcat=SE&count=10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gre-verbal.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
